alert.note: Alert for Central Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Northern San Joaquin Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 24 at 1:15AM PST until February 24 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches in the Northern Sacramento Valley including the Redding area, and along the western foothills of the Sacramento and Northern San Joaquin Valleys at or above 1000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sacramento Valley including the Redding area, Central Sacramento Valley and Northern San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow continues this morning with the heaviest accumulations expected along the western foothills of the Central Valley.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Northern San Joaquin Valley
